name: Ringside Boxing (Reslain Software)
overview: Pugilistic powerhouses punch it out in the super simulation from Ghislain de Blois and published in Loadstar #250. RINGSIDE BOXING is a sports Simulation reminiscent of TITLE BOUT and the STRAT-O-MATIC board game series. You don't get to control the in-ring action, rather you choose the fighters' strategies or let the computer choose them. RINGSIDE BOXING allows you to match fighters from different eras (such as Muhammad Ali US Rocky Marciano) or even match-ups that had never occurred, but should have (Roy Jones VS Nigel Benn or Jack Dempsey US Harry Wills).
